item.title: The Mathematical History of Economics
item.author: 滑翔闪
item.description: Reading notes on the book “Mathematics and Economics” by Shi Shuzhong, which introduces the development of mathematical tools in economics.

item.title: Recording a Dream and AI Dream Interpretation
item.author: 滑翔闪
item.description: Recording a dream and interpretations by different AIs

item.title: Institutions, Politics, Democracy
item.author: 滑翔闪
item.description: The historical context of political economy, institutional economics.

item.title: The Rhetoric of Economics
item.author: 滑翔闪
item.description: The Rhetoric of Economics discusses the literary aspects of economic works and even mathematical models from the perspective of literary criticism, offering a very unique viewpoint.

item.title: Batch Convert TIF to Excel in arcGIS
item.author: 滑翔闪
item.description: Introduction to batch operations for converting GIS TIF files to Excel files

item.title: 《Crossing Boundaries of Community》: Fluid Relations and the Origins of Communities
item.author: 滑翔闪
item.description: Xiang Biao’s 《Crossing Boundaries of Community》 is straightforward and humorous, exploring his research methodology and focusing on new community development models.

item.title: Who is the Old Monkey in Black Myth Wukong
item.author: 滑翔闪
item.description: Who is the Old Monkey in Black Myth Wukong

item.title: Empirical Economics: Intuitive Does Not Equal Obvious
item.author: 滑翔闪
item.description: People often claim that conclusions in empirical economics are always obvious, and therefore meaningless. This article aims to refute that view.

item.title: The path to a turnabout lies within
item.author: 滑翔闪
item.description: Phoenix Wright: Ace Attorney Trilogy—a game review.

item.title: Research Note 3: Mountains and Red Roses
item.author: 滑翔闪
item.description: Investigate Mentougou Jiangou Village. Surrounded by mountains, there are mountains, temples, red roses and hiking marathon enthusiasts.
